section.64: Military Expeditions led by the Prophet (pbuh) (Al-Maghaazi)

hadiths.text: Narrated `Abdullah bin `Amr bin Rabi`a:who was one of the leaders of Bani `Adi and his father participated in the battle of Badr in the company of the Prophet. `Umar appointed Qudama bin Maz'un as ruler of Bahrain, Qudama was one of the warriors of the battle of Badr and was the maternal uncle of `Abdullah bin `Umar and Hafsa
